site.title: Vansh Deshwal - AI/ML Portfolio
site.description: Data Science, AI & Machine Learning Portfolio. Showcasing innovative projects in artificial intelligence and machine learning.
site.author: Vansh Deshwal

projects.title: Interactive ML Playground
projects.description: A web-based platform for exploring machine learning algorithms with real-time visualization and interactive parameter tuning. Built from scratch with comprehensive sklearn comparisons.

projects.title: Credit Risk Modeling
projects.description: Machine learning model for predicting credit default risk using advanced ensemble methods. Features real-time risk assessment, fraud detection, and comprehensive financial analytics dashboard.

projects.title: Blockchain Security Tool
projects.description: Advanced cryptographic security analysis platform focusing on blockchain vulnerabilities and smart contract auditing. Integrating MTech research with practical security tools.

projects.title: AI-Powered Code Assistant
projects.description: Intelligent code analysis and suggestion platform combining static analysis with machine learning. Features automated code review, bug detection, and performance optimization recommendations.
